Text.Page:
This labyrinth is filled with insane clowns who would pull their own arms off if it meant pleasing Killian.

Killian's jesters came into this world for one purpose—to entertain Killian.

I charge you with this duty—eliminate all the jesters in the labyrinth.

Excellent! That petulant child deserves to have some of his toys broken.

On a practical level, if Killian is bored, he'll be more likely to make mistakes.
